1153.content: Perhaps you'd like to create a character instead of choosing one from the show. If so, i have listed such an option below for anyone to use. I just ask that you always leave another chapter path open for others to create their own characters if they so choose.
1153.title: Create your character

11531.content:
Name: Joi


Gender: Male


Age: 21


Appearance: Joi is a human with pale skin, short brown hair, and eyes of the same color. He stands in at around 5' 2" tall, and only wears a loincloth for clothing. (Though he has been known to cover himself in natural camouflage when hunting/hiding)


Personality: Joi can be a bit of a prankster at times, though he mean's well most of the time, and only really pranks someone if he thinks they deserve it. Otherwise, he often enjoys getting others into situations that more so than often work in his favor, but he would never do something that would place his family and friends in danger.


History: Straight to the point, Joi's backstory is a lot like Tarzan's backstory, except instead of Joi and his family being attacked by a...i think it was, leopard? (correct me if I'm wrong, it's been a long time since I've seen either movie) and later raised by gorillas, they were attacked by hyenas, and Joi was later raised by the lions at Pride Rock.


Anything else: If you would like to follow my character and his own adventures, please understand that i would like for the first path-line to always be reserved for me to write so i can create my own story. Though if you want to create your own story using my character, i will be placing two other path-lines down at all times for you all to use as you please.
11531.title: Create a character

115311.content:
This story takes place in an alternate reality where all the Lion King characters who were killed (Mufasa, Scar, etc) are still alive. Also, all characters who are children (Simba, Nala, etc) are now of legal age. (Just so we can avoid the whole child pornography issue) And with that said and done, let us begin.



When i woke up, it was still dark outside. I always had the habit of waking up before all the others did. But as they say, the early bird gets the worm. Or in my case, the early human gets the worm. Not that i would eat worms anyway. Perhaps something with more meat on it, and about twenty times the size of a normal worm, if not more.


"Why am i thinking about worms anyway?" I asked myself in thought. It didn't seem to matter much right now, all the others were still asleep, and they wouldn't wake up until after the sun had risen. Unless i wanted to do something before the others woke up.
115311.title: My character's story
